attributes.action: entitle MP's to 1/80th of their salary for each year is service, similar to most civil servants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most civil servants have a generous final salary pension of 1/80 of their salary per year working in that job. Half salary after 40 years. Most workers are not so fortunate.  In 2002 MP's voted themselves 1/40th of salary per year.  Half salary after 20 years.
Lets change that back to simply being a generous pension

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
